summary: The implementation covers all four requirements with excellent fidelity. The notes management system (REQ-1) is fully implemented with CRUD operations in both backend (Motoko) and frontend (React/TypeScript). The to-do list system (REQ-2) is complete with checkboxes, completion toggling, and persistence. The cute aesthetic theme (REQ-3) is thoroughly implemented with pastel colors, rounded corners, soft shadows, playful typography (Nunito font), and hover effects throughout the application. The generated images (REQ-4) are correctly referenced in components and placed in the assets/generated directory. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode theme support with dark color variants
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention dark mode or theme switching. The implementation includes extensive dark mode styling with .dark variants throughout index.css and components.

The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'User authentication or multi-user support' as a non-goal. However, the implementation includes InternetIdentityProvider, useInternetIdentity hook, and authentication-aware actor setup.
The BuildRequest does not mention sorting functionality. The backend includes getNotesSortedByTitle() function with custom comparator.
The BuildRequest does not specify toast notifications or user feedback mechanisms. The implementation includes sonner toast library with success/error notifications.
